A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have never thought about walking out of a Star Wars film before.  This will effect merchandise in the long run.  They need to say this was a nightmare of one of the characters and make a new \"the last jedi'.  Luke goes from hero to coward.  The battle scenes are boring.  Other than Rey\, none of the characters I can connect with.  After seeing every star wars to date in the theaters\, I will not being going for the next?  Nor will I be buying related merchandize.
